welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jaramijo, Ecuador! This charming coastal city is known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Jaramijo has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manta Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Manta Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Jipijapa Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reales Tamarindos Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reales Tamarindos Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bahia De Caraquez Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
